sheet.name: en
sheet.text: Hmm...
I don't hear anything.
No "gugu" on my end, either.
Ringo... Amitie...
Why do you keep saying "gugu"? Should I be worried?
How do I put it so you'll understand... Okay, let's say I was looking for you.
Then I'd keep an ear out for a "pipi" sound.
Make sense?
I see. I think I get it.
After all, O and I are comrades for life and totally inseparable.
So I suppose if one were to hear a "pipi," then—
Hey, where's O!?
What do you mean?
I thought you two were totally inseparable!
I-It's fine. No reason for alarm.
If I know O, then he probably went...
This way!
Pippipipipi! Pipipiii!♪
Gu~gu~gu~! ♪
Pipipipipi!
Gugugu!
We all warped in the middle of our battle with Amitie.
I have no idea where we are...
But at least you found yourself a cute little friend, Carby!
Gu~! Gugugugu~!
You two sure are getting along well.
Pi~! Pippipipi!
Hi there! I'm Arle!
This is my best friend, Carbuncle! Carby for short!
Guugugugugu gugu!
Piipipipipi! Piipipipipipi~!
I wonder if he's ever had a you-know-what battle before.
Can you ask him, Carby?
Pippi!
Gugu!
Really? You have?
Then let's commemorate this new friendship with a battle!
Guggu?
Pippiiiipipipiiii!
HERE WE GO!
What...?
Gugu...?
What were those? They weren't Puyo Puyos!
What were you using!?
Pipi...
O! There you are!
Piiii! Pipipipipi~!
Hey! Is that...
That's Arle standing beside O! And she looks frazzled!
Amitie! Ringo!
Get this! So during our battle earlier, these squares showed up, and—
Gu~gugu! Gu~gugu~!
He's lookin' pretty riled up.
But don't worry! I understand what you've been through.
Those squares you saw doing stuff—that was Tetris!
And the things that drop down are called Tetriminos!
I don't really get it, but you can have a Puyo Puyo battle with them!
Isn't that amazing!?
*utter confusion*
Tetris... Tetrimino...
Gugu... Gugugugu...
Oh! These are Tee and O!
Tee is the captain of the SS Tetra, and—
Ringo and I are on a quest to save the world, but there's someone we need to find first.
So you're Arle. You're a friend of Ringo's, correct?
We need your help. What do you say?
TIME OUT! W-Wait a sec!
My brain's still unscrambling from the whole warping situation.
And now... Tetris? Starship!?
Save the WORLD!?
You're right. I totally get that you don't get it. As long as you get that I get that you don't get it—
Not helping!
Gu~Gu~Gugugugu!
Well, there IS a surefire way to calm your nerves.
Yeah... Yeah! You thinking what I'm thinking?
You know it! Only if you let me take you on, that is!
You're on! Let's do this, Ringo!
Here we go...
PUYO PUYO BATTLE!
Gugugugu gugu!
Whew... Nothing like a good old-fashioned battle...
You feeling all right now, Arle?
Yup, I feel great!
Good, glad to hear it!
Now, what were we talking about?
Oh, right. What the heck's going on?
Gugu gu~?
It might take a while to explain everything.
So let's walk and talk.
The way I see it...
This doesn't seem like any old coincidence to me.
There's gotta be a reason you and Amitie were warped here.
Huh...
Sounds like we're going on another adventure!
Guess we gotta team up and watch each other's backs, don't we?
Exactly! You catch on quick!
Of course I do! I AM an adventuring pro, after all!
Guggugu!
Well, I hope you're a listening pro because this is where things get complicated...
We made it back to Suzuran Junior High!
And I brought Arle up to speed on the way here!
This is some next level stuff, Carby...
Guuu...
Even I didn't fully get it until now.
So THAT'S what's going on!
Then I'm gonna give it my all!
That's reassuring to hear. Thank you.
Pippipipipipiiii!
Ris and Maguro should be around here somewhere.
They were checking the area for abnormalities.
Heeey! ★
Hey, Maguro!
Stupendous timing, Ringo.
Hi, Ris!
Find out anything about all the weirdness going on?
Yes, regarding that...
My experiments yielded some... tremendously unprecedented results.
...Unprecedented how?
Please, turn around. Er, slowly.
Uhh...
*ominous giggle*
Need... more...
*terrified scream*
S-S-Something's there!
Pipipiiii!
After you all left, I took it upon myself to investigate the anomaly.
My goal was to track it down and pinpoint its location.
I had to invent an entirely new device to accomplish this heroic deed.
And it appears the anomaly was hiding in plain sight with you this whole time.
Much like the invisible yet undeniable nature of love, I suppose.
You make it sound like everything is all fine and dandy!
But it's not! It's super creepy!
Hey there. ★
I'm Maguro. ★ What's your name?
Me? I'm Marle.
Marle, huh?
You're the one who's been watching us, right?
Mind telling us why?
Why? Well, let's see...
I wanted to give you all the chance to meet each other!
Then everyone can battle to their heart's content! Doesn't that sound... *giggle* fun? ♪
...That's it?
Mhm! ♪
All I want is to spread fun to everyone, everywhere, all the time...
I just needed to whisk the worlds together to make it happen. ♪
Well, un-whisk them! This isn't some cosmic cooking show!
But... aren't you having fun? This IS fun, isn't it?
You're all going to have lots and lots of battles together, and it's going to be so much FUN! ♪
Huh!?
Ringo, watch out! Here she comes!
Whoa, hey! What the heck!?
We've got your back, Ringo!
Yeah! We're here to help you!
'Preciate it!
Now let's do this!
Gugugu gugugu~!
Oh...? Well, this really is going to be fun, isn't it?
Okay, then...
Time to battle!
I guess that'll do... for now. ♪
Hm, fine.
We'll play again some other time! I can't wait! ♪
We won! I couldn't have done it without all of you.
But... she got away.
There was nothing we could do about that.
Though she did say she wanted to "play again."
She likely hasn't disappeared on us for good... yet.
We mustn't slow down. Let's follow her trail.
Pipipipi!
You know...
What's up, Amitie?
That Marle girl gave me the chills!
How so?
I mean, don't get me wrong. Battles are fun, and fun is good.
But why did it sound like the creepiest thing in the world when SHE said it?
Yeah... You're right.
She's the reason both our worlds merged together.
If she can do that, she must have some serious power on her side.
She's probably keeping her real motives a secret.
And who knows what they could be.
But we should probably assume she's planning something super dangerous.
You're right. Thanks, Ris.
We definitely underestimated her. Turns out she's quite dangerous.
Pipipi pipippi...
She really gave me the chills.
Oh, I hope my friends are okay...
If I know my friends, they should be holding up all right.
But still...
Guguugu...
Hm...
Hm...
...Pipi!?
...Ha-HAH!
There you are!
Tee!
Huh!?
Ess!
Tee, you little...
What were you thinking, huh?
WHY would you leave ME behind!?
I-Is that Tee's friend?
This is all weirdly familiar...
You're not getting off that easily!
You're just a dumb king on a dumb flying tin can with a really, REALLY dumb haircut!
Uh, well, that's ONE way to greet a friend...
O-Oh, heeey. Well, um, first and foremost...
I'm glad to see you again, too, Ess.
Pipipipipipipi~pipi pipi!
Let's take some time and sort everything out, shall we?
It's such a peaceful day...!
So peaceful... and quiet...!
It's so peaceful, I could just sing at the top of my lungs! ♪
Hm...
Actually...
Come to think of it, as great as peace is... it's actually kinda boring.
It'd be more fun if something crazy and over-the-top happened.
Like if all my friends just came bursting outta the sky!
Ha! Oh, but that's nonsense!
Something like that would NEVER happen on such a peaceful day, right?
Huh...?
OH MY!
Wh-What's happening!?
I think someone's bursting outta the sky!
Yeeouch...
Where am I...?
Pipiii!?
W-Well, can't say I expected something like this!
Um, hey... Mr. Tight-Clothes Sky Diver?
Are you okay?
Pipi!
Oh, hey there, little yellow guy.
Uh, y-yeah, I'm fine. Thanks.
*ahem* Captain's report.
We've been summoned here by the Keeper of Dimensions...
We appear to have crash-landed.
And we've done so right in front of a young girl with unusual hair.
Is he reporting to that yellow ball?
Hey, you seem like you’re doing all right.
Oh, hang on... Haven't we met before?
You know, I was actually thinking the same thing...
Tee! O! Glad to see you were able to land safely.
Whoa!
Hey, you with the weird outfit!
I was just about to remember something, but you crashed so hard you made me forget again!
You look kinda familiar yourself, now that I think about it...
But enough distractions! I've gotta figure out what's going on.
Between this guy with the super tight clothes and this yellow fluff nugget...
How the heck am I supposed to process what's going on!?
I'm sorry, but there's no time to explain.
Ringo, Tee. I know this is sudden, but I need you two to battle.
Okay, sure!
It's just like that old saying goes...
"When things don't make sense, battle until they do."
That's gotta be why you want us to battle, right!?
Exactly.
Ah... of course.
Whenever a problem presents itself, the only solution is to battle!
Pippipipipi! ♪
Hey, you're pretty sharp!
Well, you said it best yourself. Now, are you ready?
Let's do this!
Puyo Puyo time!
Tetris time!
IT'S ON!
Huh!?
He doesn't play Puyo Puyo!?
She doesn't play Tetris!?
But that's...
OH NO! We're starting!
We were still able to battle, even though he was using blocks instead of Puyos.
Heh, and I wasn't half bad myself!
What were those squishy blobs with... faces?
It appears that when four or more of the same color match up, they vanish.
Couldn't have described Puyos better myself. You really ARE sharp!
And you've got some serious skills.
Lining those shapes up and erasing them... You made it look like a piece of cake!
Ah, those shapes are what we call Tetriminos.
But first things first. You, with the curly hair.
Allow me to properly introduce myself.
I'm Captain Tee of the SS Tetra.
I'm also the Tetris King.
Well, my name's Ringo!
I'm just a normal junior high student who's crazy about Puyo Puyo battles.
Wait a second...
I knew it! We HAVE met before!
Pippipipii!
Excellent. You managed to restore a bit of your bond with each other.
Oh, it's the confusing outfit guy.
Yes, th-that's me. Anyway, that'll be enough battling for now.
*sigh of relief*
Although... I know this is out of nowhere, but I need your help.
Some kind of strange phenomenon is at work.
It's trying to merge the worlds of Puyo Puyo and Tetris yet again.
And they'd already been separated once before...
Wait, wait, wait. Hold it right there.
"Separated once before"?
Does that mean this isn't the first time this has happened?
...That doesn't matter now.
While the two worlds had previously merged, the circumstances this time are different.
Someone is behind all this. I can sense it.
If the worlds merge, we'll be consumed by unimaginable chaos.
And it seems someone is intent on unleashing such chaos.
Oh.
Sorry. This all just sounds like a huge deal.
Honestly, it's kiiind of going over my head. But please, go on.
Ringo, Tee. I need the two of you to work together.
You need to discover what—and who—is causing all of this.
Well, I'm off.
You're WHAT now!?
(Geez, I didn't mean to yell at him, but what the heck? So abrupt!)
Hang on, Mr. Fancy Suspenders.
Are you going to help us or not?
I'm sorry, Ringo, but I have matters of my own to tend to.
There's an important task I need to take care of.
And with that, I must return to my post.
I know we'll see each other again, but for now...
Ex, wait!
I must leave it in your hands!
Find out who's behind all this!
Pipiiii!?
*confused thinking sounds*
*not-as-confused thinking sounds*
*pretty calm thinking sounds*
Well, better get started.
You're handling this quite well!
Yep! I stay calm during extreme situations. It's a strong suit of mine.
Besides...
I can already tell this is going to be one wild adventure!
I can't take it! I'm so pumped!
LET'S DO THIS!
Even outrageously impossible requests like this get my blood going!
It's curious, I must say.
I can't tell my left from my right in this strange place, and I've been given an unreasonable task.
Yet here I stand, undaunted.
Pippipi~! Pi! ♪
Okay, so...
We've been asked—politely—to basically save the world.
All we have to do is find someone without any clue what they look like or where they are.
Where do we even start?
Hm...
Now that you mention it, what we've been entrusted with is on a much grander scale than we are.
Then maybe "undaunted" isn't the right mindset. Might want to be a little daunted.
Then first things first: we must find others who are willing to help us.
Good thinking! Let's do that!
Pippipipipi!
Got anyone in mind, Tee?
In fact, I do.
I've been sending out transmissions via O.
Unfortunately, communications seem to be taking a while.
Pipiii...
So this little yellow ball—I mean, O—has the ability to send out transmissions?
That's right! O's my trusty sidekick.
Pipi!
You'll... get a proper introduction later.
Okay, then let's get my friends to help us out!
We'll drag them along on this sketchy quest for who-knows-what!
Interesting choice of words...
Come on, let's go find them!
...Huh?
Ringo?
What brings you here? ★ Looks like you brought some friends. ★
A guy with one heck of an outfit and a little yellow... something? ★
Oh, hey! I was just looking for you!
Guys, this is Maguro. He's a fellow classmate and my childhood friend!
H-Hey, everyone! ★ I'm Maguro! ★
So he's an acquaintance of yours, Ringo?
Then we should ask him to help us.
Though I'm not sure how to explain our rather complex situation to him...
Hey, Maguro!
Let's have a Puyo battle! Right here, right now! And put your heart into it!
Uh, what?
Yeah! You've got to speak the right language to get through to him—the language of Puyo battles!
I-I don't think it works that wa—
Sure! ★ Let's do it! ★
All right, straight to the point!
Ready?
IT'S PUYO TIME!
I think I get it now! ★
So some mysterious guy shows up out of the blue and tells you that the world's in serious trouble. ★
And now you, Tee, and his little yellow companion, O, are on a mission. ★
A mission to find out who's behind all the bizarre stuff going on! ★
But you don't have a single clue to guide you.
Sound about right? ★
Yes, exactly!
*flabbergasted sounds*
Piipipi...
Something wrong?
The way you communicate... It's on another level.
And listening to you go over our predicament again is making my head spin.
So much for being "undaunted," eh?
At any rate, count me in to help you out! ★
Booyah! Maguro joined Ringo and Tee's party!
...I what? ★
All right, let's keep it up! We've got more friends to find!
Roger that! ★
W-Wait a minute!
What's our next destination?
Piiii!
Oh, look, there's Ris!
See that upperclassman standing over there?
That's the one, the only... Risukuma! ★
...Hrrrumfrrlgwufghhfff...
Uh, Ringo? Maguro?
Risu...kuma, was it? Did he just say words?
Pipipipippi...?
Probably!
I see. Well, then...
What in the world is he?
*chuckle* I've never been able to figure that out.
And you probably won't either.
Wh-What kind of logic is that!?
Well, I suppose it doesn't matter what he is as long as we can trust him.
Of course we can! Ris is the best!
He acts just as flashy as he looks, let me tell ya.
But above all else, he's passionate about truth, science, and the pursuit of love!
...I just wanted to know whether or not we can trust him.
*intensified grumble*
At last, my grand experiment is in its final phase.
My life's work has all led up to this moment, this experiment...
I cannot let it fail. It WILL not fail!
He's conducting an experiment?
I certainly hope a random stranger doesn't try to talk to me.
That would surely shatter my concentration.
And then who knows what might blow up!
That doesn't sound even a little bit safe.
Well, go talk to him, Tee.
No way! Didn't you hear a word he said!?
Pipiiii!
It's fine! Trust me.
Ris is all about reverse psychology.
But...
Piiiipipi...
No buts! Go on!
Um, e-excuse me...
HUH!?
A random stranger is trying to talk to me!
My concentration! I'm tremendously disturbed now!
Why are you narrating everything!?
Ka-BOOOOOOM!
*uncharacteristically high-pitched shriek*
Piiiipipipipiiiii!?
...I don't know who you are or where you're from.
But I expect you'll be taking full responsibility for blowing up my experiment.
Now, prepare yourself.
For what?
Break a leg, Tee!
This is the perfect chance for you to try your hand at Puyo Puyo!
*menacing laugh*
A-Are we having a Puyo Puyo battle!?
Interesting. You seem to know a thing or two about love yourself.
Um, thanks?
Ringo, don't just stand there! Introduce me to this love prodigy already!
This is Tee! He's joining me on my quest to who-the-heck-knows.
Well, well!
And that yellow guy over there is O.
Very good, very good.
I believe I've heard all I need.
I'd be more than happy to help you out!
You rock! Thanks, Ris!
...Hey, Maguro.
What's up? ★
On a scale of one to ten, how strange is all this in your world?
Waaay beyond ten, that's for sure! ★
Hm...
Pipi...
All right, I'll ask again, just for the record.
Maguro. Ris.
Have either of you noticed anything out of the ordinary? Or maybe someone suspicious?
Well, I don't know if "suspicious" is the right word... ★
But I saw this girl wearing a big red hat. ★
I think she was over in the shopping district. ★
I happened to see something in the shopping district myself.
If I'm not mistaken, it was a young lady in blue armor accompanied by a yellow creature.
She didn't look particularly threatening, though.
Whaaat!?
Do they sound familiar, Ringo?
Maybe...
If you're talking about who I think you're talking about...
Then we have nothing to worry about!
Though I AM curious why they're here.
Then let's go find them!
Piipi!
Yeah!
You go on ahead. I've got some experiments to run.
The world is behaving in peculiar ways, and I intend to find out why!
If that's the case, then I'll stay and help, too! ★
I'll see you later, Ringo! ★
Got it! Thanks!
Okay, no time to waste.
To the shopping district!
Pippiiii! ♪
It's the shopping district! We're here!
*awestruck* There are so many different pieces on exhibit...
What a lively place!
Piiiippipipi! ♪
Those "exhibits" are actually goods that the shops are selling!
Is this your first time shopping, Tee?
Yeah. We spend most of our days on board the starship.
We rarely ever go out.
Piipipipipipii!
Oh man, a starship... That sounds so awesome!
Man, you're so lucky. I wish I could ride around in a starship.
Maybe when we have some spare time.
Right now, we have a mission to focus on. But once that's over...
You mean it!?
Aw yeah, that's all the motivation I need! Time to find our culprit!
Maybe we'll get lucky and find them around here somewhere.
I imagine they'd be wandering around, mumbling about worlds merging...
You know, some total weirdo who's gone completely bonkers.
*chuckle* Yeah, sure.
As if something so astronomically improbable could ever—
...Merging... of the worlds...
Fun...
*eerie chuckle*
Is that...
Our culprit!?
Pipipiiii!?
*gasp*
Excuse me, miss! I've got kind of a weird question for you.
You wouldn't happen to be in the world-merging business, would you!?
Hmph...
Whoa... The surrounding air is thick with energy.
Yeah, I can feel it in my bones.
She HAS to be the one we're looking for.
...It's too early.
Hey, she's getting away!
Hold it right there!
*gasp*
There are a bunch of Puyos and Tetriminos up ahead!
It seems we must clear them out in order to pass through.
*groan* Doesn't look like we have a choice!
Let's do this, Ringo!
Yeah, let's go!
PUYO TETRIS BATTLE!
*panting*
That should be the last of 'em.
Yeah... but we lost her trail.
At least we were able to get a good look at her.
That counts as a win!
She certainly was quick.
Pipipipipi? Pippipipi pi pipipi!
Yeah, you're right, O.
Ex likely sensed a suspicious presence.
That's why he sent us here.
If that's the case, then let's get moving!
We've got a job to get done!
Right!
Pipi!
Oh, nooo...
Arle and I were just having a Puyo battle... Why'd I get warped again?
WHERE AM I!?
Aaaaaarle! Caaaaaaarbuncle! Where are you guys!?
Hmph...
Oh well! Everything'll work itself out~!
I mean, just look at this place!
This is my chance to take in the sights and do my own thing!
*gasp*
That girl over there is radiating an obscene amount of positivity. It's kinda burning my eyes.
Huh?
HUH!? I-It's...
R-R-R-R... *excited squeal*
That's right! It's me, Ringo!
I had a feeling it was you! Not sure what you're doing out here, though.
Besides, a girl in a red Puyo hat could only be—
Yup, me! Amitie!
And I'm gonna be a great magician one day!
There it is! Your signature catchphrase!
I'm really glad you're here, Ringooo! There's SO much I have to tell you!
...Um, who's that next to you?
Oh, right. Let me introduce you.
This is Tee.
And HE promised to let me ride in his starship one day! Didn't you, Tee?
Uh, Ringo...
Let's stick to basic introductions for now, shall we?
This here's O. And believe me, he does a lot more than just being a cute yellow ball.
Pippipipipi!
Nice to meet you, Tee and O!
Well these introductions were less than stellar...
Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Tee.
I'm the captain of the SS Tetra, and I commit myself daily to Tetris battles in order to—
Tetris?
Why does that sound so familiar?
*thinking sounds* Perhaps it'll be quicker to simply show you.
This is how it's done!
Whoa! Say what now? A Puyo battle?
It's actually a liiiittle different, Amitie.
But don't worry! We're still able to battle!
Anyway, let's do this!
Huh? Well, all right!
Here I go!
Let's battle!
Well, that was something else!
But... I had fun!
I can't really explain it, but I think I understand you now, Tee.
Oddly enough, I feel the same way.
Pi…pipipi...piii...?
It's almost as if this isn't the first time we've met.
Pipipipipiipipii!
Oh, right! Ringo!
I'm looking for someone!
Yeah? Well, call me crazy...
But I think we're looking for the same person!
We are?
Sooo... let's keep on searching.
Okay! Then make sure to keep your ears open.
And listen real hard for a "gugu"!
G... Gugu...?
Pipi?
